text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa shows off her talents and<n>makes a
successful debut.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She then makes a surprising<n>declarationâ€”she's
decided not to pursue<n>the Classic Triple Crown in
her classic<n>year. Instead, she has her sights set on<n>
the Japan Cup.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She reasons that because her goal is to<n>be the
world's strongest racer, not her<n>generation's
strongest, she must take a<n>different path than her
friends.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
With her aptitude in mind, we choose<n>the Kyodo
News Hai for our next race.<n>It's the perfect length
and at the perfect<n>time, right after New Year's.
